Key Match Events: Afghanistan defeated Zimbabwe by 6 wickets in the first T20I of the three-match series.
Najibullah Zadran played a match-winning knock of 44 not out off 25 balls and was named Man of the Match.
Zimbabwe scored 159/8 in their 20 overs, with Sikandar Raza top-scoring with 45 runs off 31 balls.
Nijat Masood took 3 wickets for Afghanistan.
Ryan Burl took 3 wickets in one over, reducing Afghanistan from 83/0 to 86/3.
